title: where can I buy/get this flourish???
content:
I know I have seen this before a few times so I know it must be out there somewhere...can anyone tell me where I can buy it or even better if it is free : )

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017091621im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Florish_4009.jpg)
author: shielddesign

comments.content: thanks...I don't see it there any other suggestions?
recreate it! path it out keeping your points in extrema and apply a 30-45° angled brush stroke to it.

\> recreate it!

Sure, screw the original artist out of his/her commission. Nobody around here cares about that kind of thing.
It would be really faster to recreate it than to find it.
